metadata.synopsis: An old plaque made by the Lathander monks, placed near the entrance of SCL
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the fallen plaque at CRE_Main_A X: -114 Y: 66 Z: -128

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Walk in the way of dawn, for Lathander cannot protect you where the light doth not reach.*
